summary: This module provides a class that encapsulates a persistent RTP transceiver, pairing a media sender with a receiver in a WebRTC session. It exposes shared attributes such as media kind, direction, identifiers, and codec preferences, and offers mechanisms to control track assignment and negotiate media parameters.
business_intent: Allow WebRTC applications to manage and control media flow by handling sender/receiver pairing, direction changes, codec selection, and track replacement, facilitating flexible and dynamic media negotiation.
